title: YESWELDER True Color Solar Powered Auto Darkening Welding Helmet, Wide Shade 4/9-13 for TIG MIG ARC Weld Hood Helmet

Experience better clarity and true color view with its 1/1/1/1 optical clarity. The cheater lens and magnifying lens compatible design allows for added convenience. Plus, enjoy increased battery life and superior comfort with the pivot style headgear. Don't miss out on this top-quality welding helmet!
